duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and maintain financial models to support the company's budgeting, forecasting, and Mid-Year Planning.
Lead monthly financial meetings IT & Digital VPs on expense management, variance analysis, and cost allocation.

Support the annual budgeting process for both IT & Digital functions, providing variance analysis against actual results. Partner with IT & Digital Partners to be subject matter expert on vendor spend.
Forecast monthly and rest of year IT & Digital spend.
Prepare accurate and timely financial reports, including monthly and quarterly management reporting packages.
Work with the IT and Accounting teams to set up Accruals, Prepaids, & Purchase Orders.
Assist in the preparation of EC materials and other ad-hoc financial analyses.
Analyze IT & Digital spending, identify trends, and provide meaningful insights and recommendations to senior management.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Finance, Accounting, IT, or a related field. MBA or advanced degree is a plus.
